pages.title: Hellbound
pages.text: Hmmm, I think you've become powerful enough now to have this world fragment partially tethered to your soul. Because of this, I can lessen my hold here, and divert some of my essence to helping you access other planes of existence. The first of these is the realm known as the $(item)Nether$().

Hopefully opening up this realm of fire will grant you the means to get many new resources. To access the nether, build a frame of 10 or more $(item)Obsidian$() (chiseled variants are allowed) and ignite it to open the gateway.

pages.name: Nether Portal
pages.text: Portal Frame can be various sizes (Frame size shown is the smallest allowed). Activate by lighting a fire.
